name: japan-city-geojson
description: GeoJson of Japanese cities. and TopoJson. topojson wrapper.

scripts.merge: $(npm bin)/topomerge 氷見市=氷見市 < topojson/富山県/氷見市.topojson > test.merge.topo.json
scripts.mpref: $(npm bin)/topomerge 三重県=三重県 -k d.id < topojson/47都道府県/三重県.topojson > test.merge-pref.topo.json

author: niiyz <yoshida@niiyz.com> (http://niiyz.com)
